channel.title: [317]dragon claws problem
channel.description: Yea well im back again whit another problem now,im using im so famous base for my 317 project nd i was testing claws and than i saw this bug: My claws hit 30-30-30-30 but my hp only goes away 30,anyone have an idea how to fix it

item.title: [317]dragon claws problem
item.dc:creator: @3lou_55 3lou 55
item.description:
@3lou_55 wrote:

u need this code try using itâ€¦

public void dclawed2() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2);
if(AttackingOn2 != null) {
if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) {
dclaws = 0;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) != 1) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(clawed2);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2;
} else {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(0);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].killers[playerId] += hitDiff;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff;
}
}
}

Read full topic
